titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the hardware store account book 1977.157
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-09T16:28-0500

did.abstract: One large bound account book of an unnamed Brooklyn hardware store during the period 1876 to 1880. Entries detail transactions relating to store merchandise and property rental. The store is believed to have been located in the neighborhood of Brooklyn Heights, as several entries toward the front of the book mention rents paid at 24 Old Slip Street and 78 Front Street.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Hardware store account book, 1977.157, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
